Author: scammers
Title: [ANN][ICO] Modulum - The first modular IoT device on blockchains
Body: Hi All,  I have just registered here because I saw this SCAM attempt on bitcointalk.In past I was just reading the posts but I have to react on this one. So this is clearly a very weak SCAM attempt. Their reddit,webpage,facebook page are all empty and were just recently created. Also the partnership with IBM is made up nonsense. They even dont have any roadmap on their site. This is cleary a weak scam attempt. Or maybe an attempt to try to damage a good name of another cryptorucency called MODUM.  As they picked almost the same name and also the collors. Please beware of this scam and stay away, and report this MODULUM scammers. This could be Confido scammers back in action. stay safe people...................

Author: Modulum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Modulum - The first modular IoT device on blockchains
Body: These two projects are different, Modulum comes from one of our patented IOT device which has been on R&D for 3 years.  We had a look at Modum, it seems to be a great product dedicated to a vertical market, in this case data integrity for supply chain operations using Smart Contracts. With Modulum we target a horizontal market, meaning we want to provide a platform over product. Modulum is customizable both on the hardware side (i.e. sensors, communication protocols, etc.) and on the software side (i.e. running custom apps).  We are proud to count IBM as an advisor for our project. IBM is a major actor in the blockchain industry, as seen for example with their deep involvement in the blockchain Hyperledger. This knowledge will be of precious help when integrating blockchain technologies in Modulum.  It's true we only recently became active on social medias although the team was already working hard on this project which was kept secret until a month ago or so. As we were already working on our first prototypes, our patent approval process was keeping Modulum under NDA.

Author: blockchain-investor
Title: [ANN][ICO] Modulum - The first modular IoT device on blockchains
Body: This interesting MODULUM token crowdsale ( https://modulum.io ) will open in 2 hours, 8pm Paris French time, UTC+1.  For info, I had to follow the registration procedures as I forgot to go through this one :    PICOPS CERTIFICATION IS NECESSARY TO PARTICIPATE TO MODULUM ICO:  Make sure you're certified on PICOPS, the procedure will take a few minutes, juste a few questions to answer. You will have to pay 0.024 ETH: https://picops.parity.io  1) Go down the "Picops user terms & conditions" and confirm that you have read it and agreed, 2) Choose your citizen ship 3) Select your country of citizenship 4) Confirm that you possess one of these documents: a Passport, a National Identity card or a Driving Licence (Paper and Card series) Confirm that it is not expired. 5) Pay the certification fee by sending 0.024 ETH to: 0x003E6f3d498Add167c1386000850151e81BB862b You will receive your certification approval within a few minutes.  If it can help.  Good luck

Author: Modulum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Modulum - The first modular IoT device on blockchains
Body: Here is a non-exhaustive list of our ambitions: - Design Hardware & Software for 2 IoT products (Light & Full version) and for an uncountable number of add-ons - New team members for our constant growing software (which is going to include more and more blockchains) - Industrialization, tests, international experimentations, certifications of both versions and all add-ons - Creation of a blockchain ecosystem around the product, including: Modulum company, users, external services, creators, resellers, renters... - Creation of an infrastructure for devices management and for our own services (like the Modulum service rental thanks to MDL tokens) - Marketing & sales - International events planning, contests - and everything else described in our whitepaper page 17 & 23

Author: Modulum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Modulum - The first modular IoT device on blockchains
Body: Hello there,    Quote from: gazilla on November 07, 2017, 09:22:41 PM Hello I like the  project Is there a bounty campaign?  Right now, we decided that there will be a bug bounty campaign on our (soon-to-be-released) token smart contract. Introducing more bounties is something that is still being discussed by our team, such as social media promotions etc..  By the way, there are some exciting news about Modulum ICO: We released the verison 1.0 of our Whitepaper both in English and in French. Feel free to read it if you haven't already. We defined that the ICO will officially open on November 22nd at 17:00:00 UTC This week we met HyperLoop TT to discuss about Modulum, some exciting news might be announced soon We updated our website with new design elements and some extra relevant information for a better understanding of our project on a first visit We are now listed on more than 10 ICO lists: ICO list, Coin Schedule, Top ICO list, ICO Link, Sangus, ICO Tracker... We are actively working towards publishing articles about Modulum in the Medias  Feel free to ask us any question if you need any additional information about our project or the ICO. We have an email dedicated to requests about the ICO (ico@hitech-one.com) and a mailing list on our website (https://modulum.io/#contact) if you wish to subscribe to the latest news.
